fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Delay a player at night. Instead of acting tonight, they will perform their action tommorow night. They retain their original targets if possible. If you delaying their ability causes it to fail somehow (ie: It's no longer full moon so they can't use a certain ability), you're informed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Delayed players will not be told they're delayed: instead, they will be informed their ability failed.
- You can't delay a player two nights in a row.
- On the second night, the delayed player's inputted action will be replaced with their delayed action, if possible.
- Roleblock and control immune
